quote3.author: Charles Eames
quote3.quote: Recognizing the need is the primary condition for design.

quote4.author: Le Corbusier
quote4.quote: Architecture is the learned game, correct and magnificent, of forms assembled in the light.

quote5.author: Frank Lloyd Wright
quote5.quote: An idea is salvation by imagination.

quote7.author: Rem Koolhaas
quote7.quote: Not many architects have the luxury to reject significant things.

quote8.author: Frank Lloyd Wright
quote8.quote: A doctor can bury his mistakes, but an architect can only advise his clients to plant vines.

quote9.author: Frank Gehry
quote9.quote: Architecture should speak of its time and place, but yearn for timelessness.

quote10.author: Buckminster Fuller
quote10.quote: When I’m working on a problem, I never think about beauty. But when I’ve finished, if the solution is not beautiful I know it’s wrong.

quote11.author: Norman Foster
quote11.quote: As an architect you design for the present, with an awareness of the past, for a future which is essentially unknown.

quote12.author: Daniel Libeskind
quote12.quote: o provide meaningful architecture is not to parody history but to articulate it.

quote13.author: Eileen Gray
quote13.quote: To create, one must first question everything.

quote14.author: Zaha Hadid
quote14.quote: Architecture is really about well-being. I think that people want to feel good in a space… On the one hand it’s about shelter, but it’s also about pleasure.

quote16.author: Zaha Hadid
quote16.quote: There are 360 degrees, so why stick to one?

quote17.author: Frank Gehry
quote17.quote: I don’t know why people hire architects and then tell them what to do.

quote18.author: Renzo Piano
quote18.quote: One of the great beauties of architecture is that each time, it is like life starting all over again.

quote19.author: Frank Lloyd Wright
quote19.quote: The mother art is architecture. Without an architecture of our own we have no soul of our own civilization.

quote20.author: Oscar Niemeyer
quote20.quote: My work is not about form follows function, but form follows beauty or, even better, form follows feminine.
